content.quote: You are straight fire.Well, minus the “straight” part.
content.author: Joey Benevento

content.quote: Just a reminder that you’re exactly where you should be.
content.author: Melissa Woo

content.quote: I am no longer accepting the things I cannot change. I am changing the things I cannot accept
content.author: Angela Davis

content.quote: We will not win our rights by staying quietly in our closets.
content.author: Harvey Milk

content.quote: Accept no one’s definition of your life, define yourself.
content.author: Harvey Fierstein

content.quote: We need, in every community, a group of angelic troublemakers.
content.author: Bayard Rustin
